title: 148863424.contrast Vs Competition
excerpt: In a hyper-competitive world, it is infinitely more productive and helpful to ask ‘How am I different?’ versus 'How do I compare?

children.text: In a hyper-competitive world, it is infinitely more productive and helpful to ask
That's because someone will always be better than you, or have more stuff, at something. And with the web now in your pocket, finding those people is just a click away.
Better to think about all the ways your different (that make you amazing) than spend any time at all feeling miserable for what you haven't got.
